name: Rysoshi Digital Prototype
description:
This Prototype is for contribution towards my Game Development Module at Falmouth University. There is still a ways to go with this but will be update in due course.

the player experiences the criminal underworld of a dystopian japan full of corruption, violence and profitable opportunities. Take on contracted jobs as a skilled hunter to rid the streets of Osaka and put an end to the dealings of the syndicate to cripple their power on the city. Earn a reputation within the hunting business as you make your mark and search for lost answers that unveil a bigger plot that just financial gain.
